name: Tankadise
description:
What do tanks dream about on lazy summer afternoons?
A experimental sandbox game made as part of a long game jam.

Thanks to Adrian C. Totii , Cristian G. Florea and Octavian A.  Bradin for helping with testing and suggestions.

Follow me & my team on twitter to see what we come up with next ! https://twitter.com/HappyHatStudio
